capability.name: Trust Services
capability.definition: This Service Domain support a range of trust management services offered to high value customers
capability.role: Provide trust services for high value customers, including asset maintenance, court administration, tax and expense handling, asset management and estate, inheritance and income tax processing
capability.example: A trust fund is set up on behalf of a parent for their offspring. The parent sets aside cash/assets for the trust. The trust handles the cash/assets until the offspring reaches a certain age.

key_features.name: Maintain and manage trust assets
key_features.description: Enables maintain and manage trust assets to support this service domain support a range of trust management services offered to high value customers

key_features.name: Handle court and legal matters for the trust
key_features.description: Enables handle court and legal matters for the trust to support this service domain support a range of trust management services offered to high value customers

key_features.name: Administer trust related taxation and fees
key_features.description: Enables administer trust related taxation and fees to support this service domain support a range of trust management services offered to high value customers

key_features.name: Prepare estate, inheritance and income tax returns
key_features.description: Enables prepare estate, inheritance and income tax returns to support this service domain support a range of trust management services offered to high value customers
